name: Lotto Girl - Lottery machine simulator
description: - 3D realistic lottery machine - Applicable to any lottery system . UK National Lottery, EuroMillions, Euro Jackpot, Lotto6 aus 49, Bonoloto, Vietlott Mega645, Korea 6/45, France 5/49, ToTo Singapore, Turkey, Australia Oz Lotto, Philippine PCSO Lotto, etc.  . Presets : 1/10, 1/14, 2/12, 5/34, 5/49, 5/50, 5/90, 6/42, 6/45, 6/49, 6/54, 6/55, 6/58, 6/59, 6/100, 7/45, 22/80 - enable/disable specific number - change number of pick-out balls - change number of game - camera zoom in/out, rotation - cute lotto girl
